mapper.select: SELECT cpmember.cpmember_company company, hireAnnouncement.hire_announcement_title title, hireAnnouncement.hire_announcement_career career, hireAnnouncement.hire_announcement_education education, hireAnnouncement.hire_announcement_working_form_name workingFormName, hireAnnouncement.hire_announcement_salary salary, hireAnnouncement.hire_announcement_jobgrade_jobposition job, hireAnnouncement.hire_announcement_department department, concat(AREA.area_sido, ' ', AREA2.area2_gungu) area, cpmember.cpmember_detailed_address address, hireAnnouncement.hire_announcement_preferential_conditions preferentialConditions, hireAnnouncement.hire_announcement_main_job mainJob, hireAnnouncement.hire_announcement_contents contents, hireAnnouncement.hire_announcement_start_date startDate, hireAnnouncement.hire_announcement_end_date endDate, cpmember.cpmember_manager manager, industry.Industry_category industry, cpmember.cpmember_number_of_employees numEmployees, cpmember.cpmember_establish_date establishDate, cpmember.cpmember_ceo ceo, pic.cpmember_pic pic FROM linkjobs_hire_announcement hireAnnouncement INNER JOIN linkjobs_cpmember cpmember INNER JOIN linkjobs_area2 AREA2 INNER JOIN linkjobs_area AREA INNER JOIN linkjobs_industry industry INNER JOIN linkjobs_cpmember_pic pic ON hireAnnouncement.cpmember_id = cpmember.cpmember_id AND cpmember.area2_no = AREA2.area2_no AND AREA2.area_no = AREA.area_no AND industry.industry_no = cpmember.industry_no AND cpmember.cpmember_id = pic.cpmember_id WHERE hireAnnouncement.hire_announcement_no = #{hireAnnouncementNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE linkjobs_hire_announcement SET hire_announcement_title = #{hireAnnouncementTitle}, hire_announcement_recruitment_field = #{hireAnnouncementRecruitmentField}, hire_announcement_career = #{hireAnnouncementCareer}, hire_announcement_department = #{hireAnnouncementDepartment}, hire_announcement_jobgrade_jobposition = #{hireAnnouncementJobgradeJobposition}, hire_announcement_preferential_conditions = #{hireAnnouncementPreferentialConditions}, hire_announcement_education = #{hireAnnouncementEducation}, hire_announcement_salary = #{hireAnnouncementSalary}, hire_announcement_working_form_name = #{hireAnnouncementWorkingFormName}, hire_announcement_main_job = #{hireAnnouncementMainJob}, hire_announcement_end_date = #{hireAnnouncementEndDate}, hire_announcement_contents = #{hireAnnouncementContents} WHERE hire_announcement_no = #{hireAnnouncementNo} AND cpmember_id = #{cpmemberId}
mapper.select: SELECT hire_announcement_no AS hireAnnouncementNo, cpmember_id AS cpmemberId, hire_announcement_title AS hireAnnouncementTitle, hire_announcement_manager AS hireAnnouncementManager, hire_announcement_recruitment_field AS hireAnnouncementRecruitmentField, hire_announcement_career AS hireAnnouncementCareer, hire_announcement_department AS hireAnnouncementDepartment, hire_announcement_jobgrade_jobposition AS hireAnnouncementJobgradeJobposition, hire_announcement_preferential_conditions AS hireAnnouncementPreferentialConditions, hire_announcement_education AS hireAnnouncementEducation, hire_announcement_salary AS hireAnnouncementSalary, hire_announcement_working_form_name AS hireAnnouncementWorkingFormName, hire_announcement_main_job AS hireAnnouncementMainJob, hire_announcement_start_date AS hireAnnouncementStartDate, hire_announcement_end_date AS hireAnnouncementEndDate, hire_announcement_contents AS hireAnnouncementContents FROM linkjobs_hire_announcement WHERE hire_announcement_no = #{hireAnnouncementNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO linkjobs_hire_announcement( cpmember_id, hire_announcement_title, hire_announcement_manager, hire_announcement_recruitment_field, hire_announcement_career, hire_announcement_department, hire_announcement_jobgrade_jobposition, hire_announcement_preferential_conditions, hire_announcement_education, hire_announcement_salary, hire_announcement_working_form_name, hire_announcement_main_job, hire_announcement_start_date, hire_announcement_end_date, hire_announcement_contents ) VALUES ( #{cpmemberId}, #{hireAnnouncementTitle}, #{hireAnnouncementManager}, #{hireAnnouncementRecruitmentField}, #{hireAnnouncementCareer}, #{hireAnnouncementDepartment}, #{hireAnnouncementJobgradeJobposition}, #{hireAnnouncementPreferentialConditions}, #{hireAnnouncementEducation}, #{hireAnnouncementSalary}, #{hireAnnouncementWorkingFormName}, #{hireAnnouncementMainJob}, NOW(), (SELECT DATE_SUB(DATE_ADD(#{hireAnnouncementEndDate}, INTERVAL 1 DAY), INTERVAL 1 SECOND) FROM DUAL), #{hireAnnouncementContents} )
